features: One 32 oz. bottle of Alba Botanica More Moisture Coconut Milk Shampoo
Made with coconut milk to lock in moisture and hydrates hair
100% vegetarian formula made without harsh ingredients like parabens, phthalates or synthetic fragrances
Always cruelty-free, never tested on animals; recognized by the Leaping Bunny Program
body.description: For velvet soft hair, take a permanent vacation from the drying formaldehydes and damaging sulfates in ordinary shampoos. Instead, discover this cleansing treat for your thirsty tresses. Enriched with coconut milk, which is high in fatty acids and protein, and moisturizing aloe vera, this formula has shown in testing to improve hair hydration*.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #6,869 in Beauty & Personal Care (See Top 100 in Beauty & Personal Care) #204 in Hair Shampoo

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Alba Botanica Drink It Up Coconut Milk Hawaiian Shampoo, 12 oz Keep thirsty hair hydrated with Alba Botanica Drink It Up Coconut Milk Hawaiian Shampoo! Since 1979, Alba Botanica has offered 100% vegetarian personal care products that do beautiful for you, your friends and the animals and Earth you love. We make a full range of products packed with potent, botanical ingredients that are formulated to nourish the individualized needs of your skin and hair. Because we are committed to the health and happiness of all furry friends, we never test our products, or the ingredients that go into them, on animals. We recognize the need to be good stewards of all natural resources. So we try to do beautiful by reducing our environmental impact in everything we do as a business.

Leaping Bunny Certified* Alba Botanica is grounded in compassion and the ethical treatment of all living things. We look out for our furry friends by ensuring that none of our products, or any of the ingredients in them, are tested on animals. The Leaping Bunny* logo is an internationally recognized symbol for cruelty-free cosmetics, personal care, and household products. *Certification for cruelty free was given by the CCIC on October 1st, 2008. 100% Vegetarian* We love our friends, including the furry kind. That’s why we never test our products or any of the ingredients in them on animals. Our products contain no meat or by-products of animals. We also exclude all cruelly obtained animal ingredients. *see ingredients list Paraben Free We believe in using natural ingredients that help treat skin, not by using harmful chemicals like parabens. While parabens are found in skin care products to help lengthen shelf-life, they can cause long term health problems. That’s why none of Alba Botanica products use any type of parabens.

The Alba Botanica brand was born in 1979 and follows a simple mission – to Do Beautiful. To honor that vision, we created a vibrant line of body-loving products that nourish the skin, hair, and of course, the soul. Whether we’re creating a fan favorite formula or working on the next big thing, we’re dedicated tomaking high quality, 100% vegetarian products that overflow with botanical ingredients. From the choices we make in the field to the final products we put on shelves, we aim to help fellow women look beautiful on the outside while feeling beautiful on the inside.

Alba Botanica Hawaiian Green Tea SPF 45 Sunscreen Alba Botanica Day-to-Day Defense Setting Mist, SPF 30 Alba Botanica Sensitive SPF 50 Sunscreen Alba Botanica Cool Sport Sunscreen, Refreshing Clear Spray SPF 50 More Products From Alba Botanica This lightweight sunscreen is made with antioxidant-rich green tea and soothing aloe vera for broad spectrum protection and a smooth, soothing finish. A lightweight, non-comedogenic protecting face mist that can be applied first or misted over makeup for a sheer, matte finish. Great for us as a setting spray with a added layer of daily sun protection! Our lightweight, air-powered mist is made with botanical ingredients such as chamomile and aloe for a smooth finish without a heavy or greasy feeling. This lightweight mist is air-powered and fast drying so it never slows you down.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: First shampoo I felt compelled to write a review for. This is a wonderful shampoo that has left my hair feeling soft and clean. It also has a nice scent as well. I have used many products over the years and this shampoo has made a difference for me. Will definitely buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light, fragrant, silky clean
reviews.reviewText: Leaves hair silky clean, not flyaway dry, without the heavy creamy texture of other brands. Love this shampoo & conditioner too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for dry scalp
reviews.reviewText: I have had very dry and itchy scalp for yrs. Not anymore. This shampoo works great and took all the dryness and itching away. It lathers up nice and your hair feels clean after washing it. I can't tell how happy my scalp is. I will never be without this shampoo. Love love love this shampoo.. :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars A must have!!!
reviews.reviewText: Haven’t bought a shampoo and conditioner that leaves the hair soft, is anti freeze and great for blond hair. I could go to sleep with my hair down and wake up with soft, untangled and healthy hair. When styling it has an after shine. My hair was very dry, unhealthy and tangled all the time. Best product to have. Smells good too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My Favorite Shampoo!
reviews.reviewText: I love this shampoo! The first time I used it I couldn't believe the difference it made in hair. My hair was so much softer, easier to comb through and bouncier after washing with it. It smells so so good too, just like coconut. It makes me feel like I'm in a tropical rainforest when I used it.I recently tried a different brand thinking, oh it can't be that different. Was I ever wrong. It's settled this is my absolute fav shampoo I've ever used! I couldn't even finish out the other brand's bottle because this one is so much better!.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product is great for dry colored hair. Plus it smells good too

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My favorite shampoo and conditioner. Such a great value here too.
Product was bubble wrapped but still leaked . I was able to clean off and still use fortunately

reviews.reviewTitle: Smells amazing and leaves hair soft and frizz free!
reviews.reviewText: Love the smell of this shampoo!
Es ist wirklich ein wundervolles Produkt

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on May 7, 2018

reviews.reviewText: I disliked the fact the product was leaking
